p: According to the Italian National Institute of Health, the CFR in Italy was 7.2% among 22,512 cases up to March 17, 2020 ( 14). According to data collected by the South Korea CDC, the CFR was 1.79% among 10,237 cases up to April 5, 2020 ( 89). According to the CDC in the United States, the CFR was 2.5% among 304,826 cases as of April 5, 2020 ( 65).
